title: 88/188/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 February 1988 amending Decision 87/163/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to permit temporarily the marketing of forestry seed not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 71/161/EEC (only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 25 February 1988  amending Decision 87/163/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to permit temporarily the marketing of forestry seed not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 71/161/EEC  (Only the  German text is authentic)  (88/188/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 87/163/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 1, ´28 February 1987' is replaced by ´30 April 1988'.
2. In Article 2, ´31 March 1987' is replaced by ´31 May 1988'.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 February 1988.
For the Commission  Frans ANDRIESSEN  Vice-President   (1) OJ No L 87, 17. 4. 1971, p. 14.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 65, 10. 3. 1987, p. 27.
